featured.text: With digital cameras, you aren’t spending money on film for wasted pictures,” she said.

definition.zh_def: 浪費的，無用的；醉酒的，失去理智的。
definition.en_def: Spent or used carelessly or without purpose; intoxicated or in a state of diminished mental capacity.
definition.example: He felt wasted after the party and couldn't remember how he got home.
